SAED patterns with the [010]
C
2/ m and [111]
C
2/ m incidences calculated for orientation variant A (corresponding respectively to the [100]
Cmcm and [102]
Cmcm incidences for the η phase) are shown in Figure 2(q, r), respectively. The experimental SAED patterns ( Figure 2(i– n)) are well reproduced by the calculation ( Figure 2(q, r)), except for the splitting of superlattice diffraction spots.
